description:
No more casual clothes and relaxing at the Citadel anymore! The Second Unit mobilizes with a fresh start, and lands in Kyoto 1866.  Here, they need to protect one of the Touken Danshi’s former masters. However, due to a certain rule, they need to avoid seeing their former master if possible. Will they be able to protect him while not getting into contact with him?
Source: crunchyroll
